description: This file defines a Python class 'vLLM' for interacting with vLLM models via an OpenAI-compatible API. It includes configuration attributes, initialization validation, and request parameter construction methods.

classes.name: vLLM
classes.description: A data class for managing vLLM model interactions, extending OpenAILike, with attributes for configuration and methods for request handling.

methods.name: __post_init__
methods.description: Validates configuration after initialization, ensuring required environment variables are set and setting up the request body.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Constructs and returns request parameters for API calls, including optional parameters and logging.
